attributes.action: That queen Elizabeth II revert to her historic title "Queen of Scots"  in all official and unofficial capacities
attributes.additional_details:
The people of Scotland being subjects of Queen Elizabeth II wish Her and all future Monarchs to use the historic title "Queen, or King in the case of a male Monarch, of Scots."

This is a traditional title historically used by Scottish Monarchs and  Her Scottish subjects feel this would reflect the love of the Monarch for Scotland and its people.

Her Scottish subjects feel that by using this title, Her Majesty Queen  Elizabeth II and Her heirs, will be reflecting nationally and internationally the place that Scotland and the Scottish people have in Great Brtain, The United Kingdom  and in the Monarch's Kingdom.

rejection.details: This is a matter for Buckingham Palace to comment upon.
